metadata.title: CVE-2019-10206 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ansible-playbook -k and ansible cli tools, all versions 2.8.x before 2.8.4,all 2.7.x before 2.7.13 and all 2.6.x before 2.6.19, prompt passwords byexpanding them from templates as they could contain special characters.Passwords should be wrapped to prevent templates trigger and exposing them.

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
